languageKey.label: Organizers for Calendar Base event records.

If your events regularly use a particular organizer, or if you want to provide the organizer's information for registration or for other reasons, you may create a Calendar Event Organizer record that includes more information than the Event Record contains in the Organizer Tab.
Use this to temporarily exclude this organizer from display.
Name of the individual, group, or company responsible for organizing the event.
The description of the organizer.
The street address of the organizer.
The ZIP code or postal code of the organizer.
The city of the organizer.
The country of the organizer.
The state of the organizer. The drop-down menu will not be available until you have included the country information and saved the form.
The phone number of the organizer.
The email address of the organizer.
A logo or photo of the organizer or their company.
The website of the organizer.
This link can be used to provide more information about the organizer.
Alternate text shown if images are not found or not supported.
If you have multiple images, alt text entries must be listed on separate lines.
Tooltip or hover text.
If you have multiple images, title text entries must be listed on separate lines.
Adds a caption beneath each image.
If you have multiple images, captions must be listed on separate lines.
Veranstalter die Ereignisse des Kalenders organisieren.
Erstellt Veranstalter (Organizer), die in Ereignissen angegeben werden können.
Verwenden Sie diese Funktion, um einen Veranstalter temporär nicht anzeigen zu lassen.
Der Name des Veranstalters
Geben Sie hier eine möglichst aussagekräftige Beschreibung des Veranstalters ein.
Die Straße (und Nummer) des Veranstalters.
Die Postleitzahl des Veranstalters.
Die Stadt des Veranstalters.
Eine Telefonnummer des Veranstalters.
Eine E-Mail-Adresse des Veranstalters.
Ein Bild des Veranstaltungsortes.
Die Webseite des Veranstalters.

Es erweist sich für den Webseitenbesucher als überaus nützlich eine evtl. vorhandende Webseite (URL) des Veranstalters anzugeben, wo sich weitere Informationen über den Veranstalter und die von ihm organisierten Ereignisse finden.
Organizers for THE Calendar for TYPO3
Create Organizers which can be used in events.
Use this to temporarily exclude this organizer from display.
Enter a name for the organizer-record.
This is the description of the organizer.
Street.
Postal ZIP-Code
The City where the organizer is
A phone-number of the organizer
A email-adress of the organizer
A picture (for example a logo) of the organizer.
The website of the organizer.
It's useful to give a webesite, where more Information about the organizer and the events can be found.
